eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Carbon; Fremont; Lincoln; Sublette; Sweetwater; Uinta, WY; at 12:05 AM ON JAN 13, 2026 Effective until 12:05 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: ASHANTI ALERT HAS BEEN ISSUED ON BEHALF OF GREEN RIVER POLICE DEPARTMENT FOR PAUL KINCAID 80 YEARS OF AGE 5FT 4IN, 160LBS GRY HAIR AND BLU EYES. SUBJECT HAS DEMENTIA AND DIABETES, HE HAS NOT BEEN SEEN OR HEARD FROM SINCE 1/10/26. SUBJECT IS DRIVING A SIL 2013 FORD F150 WITH A GRY CAMPER SHELL AND WINCH ON THE FRONT LAST KNOWN LOCATION WAS HIS RESIDENCE IN GREEN RIVER. ANYONE WITH INFOMATION SHOULD CALL 911
